message.body: Ldc is going to set up at some science faire thing for kids. We're having a brain storming meeting for ideas in half an hour. Can you think of anything?
Something that revolves around language data for kids?
Yeah h
Jeez. I think I'm the wrong person to ask but I'll try to think.
Haha well I figured you don't know the sciencey party so if you think of something it would be kid friendly
Well it's kids of all ages
Well what are you thinking about? If you have an idea I can try to make it kid friendly.

I don't know. It doesn't have to be language data related, just language or linguistics related. I'm thinking about how you can make the vocal tract from household items. Like we can have tubes for them. If you set them up in certain ways, blowing into it can make an AH or EE or OO sound.
Also I'm thinking about how Carlos really liked Google translate
Oh that sounds cool! Good for younger kids.
The vocal tract one?
Yeah
Okay good
We do machine translation stuff, so I'm wondering how I can adapt that
Well if you have older kids you can just really simplify the concept of machine translation with examples. It doesn't necessarily have to be hands on.
I guess so. I want it to be fun though
Can you picture having fun with a translator?
Like Google translate?
Yeah
I don't know. I think Carlos just liked how words sounded funny in different languages.
Any kids nowadays can go on Google translate by themselves.
Haha I guess so
I like the tubes. Even if you have posters with all the different places you can put your tongue to produce different sounds would be good. You can teach some kids how to roll their r' s.
Oh right! That's good
Do you know if you're going to Han Dynasty? We're trying to figure out what we want for dinner because they might be going to Wal-Mart tonight and she doesn't have a lot of time to cook.
I know you say to never worry about you but I do. Haha.
Cassy's post card came in.
Sorry, just came out of the meeting
I'm probably not going
That's ok. I figured you were still in there. But since they're going shopping they're getting McDonald's on the way home :/
Me and my mom are just too hungry. So my dad is going to pick up the food on his way home. You want a big mac, chicken nuggets,and fries.
Yeah
